item.title: JavaScript check if a string is valid SSH git URL using check-more-types library
item.description: In this JavaScript tutorial we learn how to check whether a given string is a valid SSH git URL or not using the check-more-types library. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Create the sample project Firstly we create an empty project with the following command. mkdir sample-project cd sample-project npm init -y And install the check-more-types module using the following command. npm install check-more-types --save (adsbygoogle = window.
